tv.matchstick.fling

Interface Fling.FlingApi

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Fling.FlingApi.FlingApiImpl
    Enclosing class:
    Fling

    public static interface Fling.FlingApi
    The entry point for interacting with a Fling device.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Fling.FlingApi.FlingApiImpl
      Implementation of FlingApi interface

      • requestStatus

        void requestStatus(FlingManager client)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Request current receiver application's status
        Parameters:
        client - Api client with which to perform this request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is no active service connection.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If an I/O error occurs while performing the request.

      • sendMessage

        PendingResult<Status> sendMessage(FlingManager client,
                                  java.lang.String namespace,
                                  java.lang.String message)
        Send one message to the current connected receiver application.
        Parameters:
        client - Api apiclient with which to perform this request.
        namespace - the dest namespace. Namespace must begin with the prefix " urn:x-cast:".
        message - message which will be sent
        Returns:
        pending result which can be used to see whether the message has been enqueued to be sent to a Fling device.

      • launchApplication

        PendingResult<Fling.ApplicationConnectionResult> launchApplication(FlingManager client,
                                                                   java.lang.String applicationId)
        Launch a receiver application
        Parameters:
        client - Api client with which to perform this request.
        applicationId - The ID of the receiver application to launch.
        Returns:
        pending result which can be used to retrieve connection information.

      • launchApplication

        PendingResult<Fling.ApplicationConnectionResult> launchApplication(FlingManager client,
                                                                   java.lang.String applicationId,
                                                                   boolean relaunchIfRunning)
        Launch a receiver application
        Parameters:
        client - Api client with which to perform this request.
        applicationId - application Id The ID of the receiver application to launch.
        relaunchIfRunning - If true, relaunch the application if it is already running.
        Returns:
        launch's pending result which can be used to retrieve connection information.

      • joinApplication

        PendingResult<Fling.ApplicationConnectionResult> joinApplication(FlingManager client,
                                                                 java.lang.String applicationId,
                                                                 java.lang.String sessionId)
        Join to the current running receiver application. The previous PendingResult will be canceled with the Fling.ApplicationConnectionResult's status code being CANCELED.
        Parameters:
        client - Api client with which to perform this request.
        applicationId - application Id of the receiver application to join.
        sessionId - The expected session ID of the receiver application, or null to connect without checking for a matching session ID
        Returns:
        join's pending result which can be used to retrieve connection information.

      • joinApplication

        PendingResult<Fling.ApplicationConnectionResult> joinApplication(FlingManager client,
                                                                 java.lang.String applicationId)
        Join to the current running receiver application. The previous PendingResult will be canceled with the Fling.ApplicationConnectionResult's status code being CANCELED.
        Parameters:
        client - Api client with which to perform this request.
        applicationId - application Id of the receiver application to join.
        Returns:
        join's pending result which can be used to retrieve connection information.

      • joinApplication

        PendingResult<Fling.ApplicationConnectionResult> joinApplication(FlingManager client)
        Join to the current running receiver application.
        Parameters:
        client - Api client with which to perform this request.
        Returns:
        join's pending result which can be used to retrieve connection information.

      • leaveApplication

        PendingResult<Status> leaveApplication(FlingManager client)
        Disconnect from receiver application If there is no currently active application session, this method does nothing. If this method is called while stopApplication(GoogleApiClient) is pending, then this method does nothing. The Status's status code will be INVALID_REQUEST.
        Parameters:
        client - Api client with which to perform this request.
        Returns:
        leave's pending result which can be used to retrieve if the command was successful.

      • stopApplication

        PendingResult<Status> stopApplication(FlingManager client)
        Stops any running receiver application(s) If this method is called while leaveApplication(FlingManager) is pending, then this method does nothing. The Status's status code will be INVALID_REQUEST.
        Parameters:
        client - Api client with which to perform this request.
        Returns:
        stop's pending result which can be used to retrieve if the command was successful.

      • stopApplication

        PendingResult<Status> stopApplication(FlingManager client,
                                      java.lang.String sessionId)
        Stop aplicationStops the currently running receiver application, optionally doing so only if its session ID matches the supplied one. If this method is called while leaveApplication(FlingManager) is pending, then this method does nothing. The Status's status code will be INVALID_REQUEST.
        Parameters:
        client - Api client with which to perform this request.
        sessionId - session Id of the application to stop. sessionId cannot be null or an empty string.
        Returns:
        stop's pending result which can be used to retrieve if the command was successful.

      • setVolume

        void setVolume(FlingManager client,
               double volume)
        throws java.io.IOException,
               java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
               java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Set device's volume If volume is outside of the range [0.0, 1.0], then the value will be clipped.
        Parameters:
        client - Api client with which to perform this request.
        volume - volume level, in the range [0.0, 1.0].
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is no active service connection.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the volume is infinity or NaN.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If an I/O error occurs while performing the request.

      • getVolume

        double getVolume(FlingManager client)
          throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Get current device's volume, the range is [0.0, 1.0].
        Parameters:
        client - Api client with which to perform this request.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If there is no active service connection.

             boolean mute)
      throws java.io.IOException,
             java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Set device mute state, mute or unmute.
        Parameters:
        client - Api client with which to perform this request.
        mute - mute status Whether to mute or unmute the audio.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is no active service connection.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If an I/O error occurs while performing the request.

      • setMessageReceivedCallbacks

        void setMessageReceivedCallbacks(FlingManager client,
                                 java.lang.String namespace,
                                 Fling.MessageReceivedCallback callback)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Set callback function when received messages on the specific namespace The new listener will replace an existing listener for a given namespace. Messages received by the controller for the given namespace will be forwarded to this listener. The caller must have already called connect() and received onConnected(Bundle) callback.
        Parameters:
        client - Api client with which to perform this request.
        namespace - used namespace of the Fling channel. Namespaces must begin with the prefix "urn:x-cast:".
        callback - callback function
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs while performing the request.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown when the controller is not connected to a FlingDevice.

      • removeMessageReceivedCallbacks

        void removeMessageReceivedCallbacks(FlingManager client,
                                    java.lang.String namespace)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Remove message received callback function from this controller for a given namespace.
        Parameters:
        client - Api client with which to perform this request.
        namespace - used namespace
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs while performing the request.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If namespace is null or empty.
